_sText:
This is a fix for my previous version of this map
Changes include: - removed the elevator and replaced it with a ladder
 - less time to hide, more time to seek
 - adjusted lounge cushions as falling between them was annoying players

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

The map is hide and seek between the two teams.
The starting room/lobby is merely to decide which team hides, and which seeks.
Map credits are in the map
Please do not directly copy any aspect of this map for your own use (except for the hide and seek aspects and the player selection method at the start)
